description[String]: Find your mailbox and open it.
Read the letter in your mailbox.
Claim the Reward Points in the letter.
Close your mailbox.

Interact with the central table to access the Map of Adventures.
Press [Play] on the Map to begin an adventure.
Speak to <joe unnamed> to learn what's happening.
Clear all menacing foes down the cobble path.
Collect all treasure dropped by foes.
Choose your class: Warrior, Hunter or Mage?
Use the portal scroll and return to the manor.
Open your inventory and equip the new item you've earned.

Defeat raptors and collect pieces of Lizard Leather.
Collect all treasure dropped by foes.
Use the portal scroll and return to the manor.
Access the crafting room, now that you have a key.
Interact with the anvil to access item crafting.
Upgrade one of your items to improve its greatness.
Reach character level 5.
Access the crafting room.
Interact with the cauldron to access potion crafting.
Make a potion to fill your empty slot.
Visit <unnamedville> and help solve a mystery.
Go to town square and check out the harvest parade.
What's got the mayor upset? Talk to him and find out.
Search for clues as to the disappearence of Phillip.
Follow the fresh trail left by no-gooders.
Find a way into the encampment.
Locate Phillip, the pig with an outie bellie-button.

Open the shop and buy an Incense.

Choose any sitting place and sit down.

Go behind the bar and take an empty cup.
Fill the cup at any barrel.
Interact with the bar to serve the drink.
Go to Pirate Pinball and begin a game.
Play until you run out of balls.
